title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Develop detailed project scope, use cases, and functional requirements for PersonalWormholeGenerator.

title: Design Wormhole Generator Architecture
description: Create an architectural blueprint for the PersonalWormholeGenerator device.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
description: Design and implement the frontend interface for user interaction with the PersonalWormholeGenerator.

title: Implement Backend Logic for Wormhole Generation
description: Develop the backend logic for generating stable micro wormholes.

title: Create Database Schema for Storing User Data and Wormhole Information
description: Develop the database schema for storing user data and wormhole information.

title: Implement DevOps Strategy for Building and Deploying the Device
description: Develop a DevOps strategy for building, testing, and deploying the PersonalWormholeGenerator.

title: Perform Security Audit on the Device
description: Conduct a thorough security audit to ensure the PersonalWormholeGenerator is secure against potential threats.
dependencies: Implement Backend Logic for Wormhole Generation

title: Write User Manual and API Documentation
description: Write user manual and API documentation for the PersonalWormholeGenerator.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction

title: Conduct Unit Tests for Each Component of the Device
description: Write and execute unit tests for each component of the PersonalWormholeGenerator.
dependencies: Implement Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Implement Backend Logic for Wormhole Generation
